content.name: bag
content.label: Bag
content.gloss: bags, including backpack, suitcase, luggage, hand/shoulder bag, paper/plastic bag, etc.

content.name: backpack
content.label: Backpack
content.gloss: a bag with shoulder straps that allow it to be carried on one's back

content.name: briefcase
content.label: Briefcase
content.gloss: a case with a handle and a hinged lid, used for carrying clothes and other personal possessions

content.name: luggage
content.label: Luggage
content.gloss: suitcases or other bags in which to pack personal belongings for traveling

content.name: hand_or_shoulder_bag
content.label: Hand or Shoulder Bag
content.gloss: hand bag or shoulder bag

content.name: paper_bag
content.label: Paper Bag
content.gloss: a bag made of paper

content.name: plastic_bag
content.label: Plastic Bag
content.gloss: a bag made of plastic

content.name: handle
content.label: Handle
content.gloss: a handle that attaches to the bag and is designed for human to grasp by hand

content.name: shoulder_strap
content.label: Shoulder Strap
content.gloss: a strap that is used for human to carry the bag on shoulder

content.name: bag_body
content.label: Bag Body
content.gloss: the main bag body part, a container that contains stuffs

content.name: buckle
content.label: Buckle
content.gloss: a flat, typically rectangular frame with a hinged pin, used for joining the ends of a belt or strap

content.name: zipper
content.label: Zipper
content.gloss: a device consisting of two flexible strips of metal or plastic with interlocking projections closed or opened by pulling a slide along them, used to fasten garments, bags, and other items

content.name: pull_out_handle
content.label: Pull-out Handle
content.gloss: a handle that can pull out to fit human's height while pulling the luggage

content.name: grip
content.label: Grip
content.gloss: a firm hold; a tight grasp or clasp

content.name: bar
content.label: Bar
content.gloss: a long rod or rigid piece of wood, metal, or similar material

content.name: caster
content.label: Wheel Assembly
content.gloss: a pivoting roller attached to the bottom of furniture or trucks or portable machines to make them movable

content.name: brake
content.label: Brake
content.gloss: a restraint used to slow or stop a vehicle

content.name: caster_yoke
content.label: Caster Yoke
content.gloss: forked part for connecting wheel to mounting plate

content.name: caster_stem
content.label: Caster Stem
content.gloss: post part of caster rig

content.name: caster_mounting_plate
content.label: Mounting Plate
content.gloss: a sheet of metal or wood or glass or plastic

content.name: wheel
content.label: Wheel
content.gloss: a simple machine consisting of a circular frame with spokes (or a solid disc) that can rotate on a shaft or axle (as in vehicles or other machines)
